entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
